availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Washington Riley (Caldwell co., ky, job worker )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, job worker. Tennessee native. Married to Anna Riley. Father of Alfred Riley, William Riley, Mary Riley, Petra Jane Riley, Melissa Riley, Caleb Riley, Preston Riley, Nancy Riley, Susan Riley, and George Riley. Farmer in Fentress County, Tennessee, in 1850. Job worker in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Fentress County, District 8, p. 419A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 43.
